Chukwunaeme Obiejesi
Broadcast Journalist, Igbo
Ebe foto si, Youtube screengrab
Ekwensi bụ onye isiojii mbụ nwetara ọkwa 'director' na mịnịstrị mgbasaozi na Nịjirịa, mana ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ahụ sonyere Biafra
Aha Cyprian Ekwensi bụ aha na-ada ụda, ọbụghị sọ na Naịjirịa nakwa Afrịka, kama n'ụwa niile.
Ihe e jikarị mara Ekwensi bụ ide akwụkwọ, mana ọrụ ọ rụrụ oge a lụrụ agha Naịjirịa na Biafra sokwa n'ihe e ji mara ya.
Gịnị ka ị ma maka Chinua Achebe debanyere aha ya n'obi ndị Naịjirịa?
Onye bụ Flora Nwapa a e chiri Ogbuefi?
Gịnị ka ị ma maka Buchi Emecheta?
Tony Ubesie: Akatamkpo nwoke gbara mbọ maka nkwalite asụsụ Igbo
Lee ihe ndị ị kwesịrị ịma maka Cyprian Ekwensi:
Ebe foto si, Youtube screengrab
Cyprian Ekwensị bụ onye nkuzi, onye nlekọta ọhịa (forester), onye mmepụta ọgwụ (pharmacist), onye mgbasa ozi (broadcaster) nakwa onye mmepụta ejije (film maker)
Aha ya niile bụ Cyprian Odiatu Duaka Ekwensi
A mụrụ ya n'abalị iri abụọ na isii nke ọnwa Sepụtemba afọ 1921 (Sept. 26, 1921), na Minna, isi obodo Niger State
Ọ bụ onye Nkwelle Ezunaka dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Oyi n'Anambra Steeti
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na 'Government College' dị n'Ibadan, nakwa 'Achimota College' nke dị na Ghana
Ọ gụkwara na 'School of Forestry dị n'Ibadan
Ekwensi mechara nweta ọmụmụ dịka 'Pharmacist' n'ụlọakwụkwọ 'Yaba Technical Institute' na Legọs
Ọ lụrụ nwaanyị (Eunice Anyiwo) ma mụta ụmụ ise
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị anọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2007
Ọ dị afọ 86 oge ọ nwụrụ
Cyprian Ekwensi na agha Biafra
Ebe foto si, Youtube screengrab
Cyprian Ekwensi bụ onyeisi mgbasa ozi mba Biafra n'oge ahụ
Oge ọgụ Biafra malitere, Ekwensi hapụrụ nnukwu ọkwa o ji na ngalaba mgbasaozi nke gọọmentị Naịjirịa, wee sonyere Biafra.
E nyere ya ọkwa onyeisi mgbasaozi nke Biafra n'oge ahụ.
Lee onyonyo gosiri nke a dị ka ụlọọrụ ntaakụkọ 'Africa Press' si wepụta:
Oge agha kwụsịrị, Ekwensi malitere ire komkom rọba iji chụta ihe ọ na-eri, n'ihi na ọrụ ya na ngalaba mgbasaozi Naịjirịa alaala.
Lee ihe o kwuru oge otu onye ntaakụkọ n'oge ahụ gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ maka ya:
Akwụkwọ Cyprian Ekwensi degara
Ekwensi dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ a nụrụ aha ha anụ n'ụwa niile.
Akwụkwọ mbụ o dere bụ n'afọ 1947, mana tupu ọ nwụọ, o bipụtara akwụkwọ karịrị iri anọ (40).
Malite n'afọ 1960 Naịjirịa nwetara nnwereonwe ya, Ekwensi na-ede opekatampe otu akwụkwọ kwa afọ.
Akwụkwọ ya bụ 'Jagua Nana' bụ nke a ga-asị kacha wuo ewuo.
Lee ụfọdụ akwụkwọ ndị o bipụtara:
Ebe foto si, Youtube screengrab
When love whispers
Jagua Nana
Jagua Nana's daughter
People of the city
Drummer boy
Burning grass
Samankwe and the highway robbers
An African night's entertainment
Passport of Mallam Ilia
Coal camp boy
Juju Rock
The Leopard's Claw
The Boa Suitor
Beautiful Feathers
Rainmaker
The Great Elephant Bird
Gone to Mecca... dịrị gawazie
Cyprian Ekwensi ji akwụkwọ ya bụ Jagua Nana wee rite nturuugo pụrụ iche a kpọrọ 'Dag Hammarskjöld International Prize in Literature', n'afọ 1968.
Ka afọ ya gbagotewere, Ekwensi sonyekwara ụlọọrụ ntaakụkọ 'Drum Magazine' dịka onye odee nke bekee kpọrọ 'columnist'.
Na 2001, Naịjirịa nyekwara ya nkwanye ugwu dịka 'Member of the Federal Republic' (MFR)
Nwa Cyprain Ekwensi bụ George Ekwensi bụ onyeisi otu 'Cyprain Ekwensi Foundation'
Nwa ya nwoke bụ George Ekwensi kwuru na nna ya abaghị oke ọgaranya.
Ọ bụ nwa ya nwoke a na-elekọta otu a kpọrọ 'Cyprain Ekwensi Foundation'.
Ọrụ ha bụ ime ka agụmakwụkwọ na-abawanye na Naịjirịa, nakwa inyere ndị nwunye ndị ọrụ nchekwa di ha nwụrụ anwụ aka.
Cyprian Ekwensi na Chimamanda Adichie
Ebe foto si, Instagram/Chimamanda
Chimamanda Adichie, ada Igbo e ji ide akwụkwọ mara, kwuru na Cyprian Ekwensi
Ndụ Ekwensi metụrụ ndụ ọtụtụ mmadụ na Naịjirịa.
Otu onye n'ime ha bụ Chimamanda Adichie, onye kwuru na Cyprain Ekwensi bụ onye kachasị metụta ndụ ya nakwa ọrụ ya dịka ode akwụkwọ.
Na mkparịtaụka o nwere ọtụtụ afọ gara aga, Chimamanda kwuru na  ọbụ Ekwensi ka ọ na-elegara anya oge ọ na-eto eto.
Akụkọ ndị ọzọ ga-amasị gị:
Chike Obi: Odogwu Igbo ji 'mathematics' rie amusu

Ị na-anụ maka Nwafor Orizu mana ị ma etu o si si nga bụrụ onyeisi ụlọomeiwu?
Ihe mere Anambra state ji bụrụ 'ọmalịcha nwaanyị' a kpụ n'ọnụ
